short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes product reviews on Amazon & Flipkart using OpenAI's GPT model

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing ReviewGPT, a powerful and time-saving Chrome extension designed to revolutionise your online shopping experience on Flipkart.com, Amazon.com and Amazon.in. With just a single click, this extension helps you make informed decisions by providing a comprehensive summary of all product reviews and the percentage of negative reviews, saving you the trouble of sifting through tens or even hundreds of reviews.

Key Features:

1. Quick and Easy-to-Use: Simply navigate to a product page, click the "Generate Summary" button in the extension popup, and watch as the magic unfolds. In just a few moments, you'll have a concise summary of all the reviews and the percentage of negative reviews at your fingertips. (As per the current capacity of the AI model GPT 3.5 turbo, our extension currently summarises first 100 product reviews on Flipkart and 50 on Amazon)

2. AI-Powered Analysis: Powered by OpenAI's advanced GPT-3.5-turbo API, our extension intelligently condenses the most relevant and insightful information from customer reviews, ensuring you receive a well-rounded understanding of the product.

3. Unbiased Insights: The AI Review Summariser delivers an impartial overview, taking into account both positive and negative reviews to help you make an educated purchasing decision.

5. Lightweight and Secure: The AI Review Summariser is designed with performance and security in mind, ensuring a seamless user experience without compromising your browser's speed or your data privacy.

6. Customer Support: We value your feedback and are committed to providing exceptional customer support. If you encounter any issues or have suggestions for improvements, please don't hesitate to reach out. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

7. Free to Use: Enjoy all the incredible features of the AI Review Summariser without spending a dime. This extension is completely free, making it accessible to everyone looking to enhance their online shopping experience.

FAQs:

Q1. I’m getting a message “reviews for this product might be too long for GPT's current capacity”
Ans: For some products, customers tend to give lengthy reviews, in such cases, reviews can exceed the word limit set by OpenAI. Please use the extension for a different product, for now.

Q2. I’m getting a message: “A summary is not required due to lack of reviews” even when reviews are there!
Ans: Make sure you are on the correct page. You do not need to click on ‘see all reviews’. Just open the product page on Amazon/Flipkart, open the extension, and click the ‘generate summary’ button.

Q3. It is showing "Please wait while..  " message forever!
Ans: Make sure you are on the correct page. The extension works only when you are on a product page of Amazon or Flipkart site.

Disclaimer: While we strive to provide the best user experience, please note that the AI used in this extension is a large language model, and in rare cases, it may generate unwanted content. We continually work to improve the extension and minimise such occurrences.

Say goodbye to the hassle of reading through endless reviews and embrace the future of online shopping with the AI Review Summariser Chrome extension. Download and install today to unlock the full potential of AI-powered review analysis, and make smarter, more informed purchasing decisions.
